name: bRyX
description:
Similar to Breakout, but twice the chaos. Move your paddle to hit the balls to their corresponding colors. Every ten seconds the brick walls will close in. 

Destroy all the blocks before you are crushed!

********** Bryx **********

Game Objective: Destroy all the blocks

Controls: WS to move

(Created for a 12-hour game jam)

Programming :: Jon Fisher

Art :: Sophia Fisher

Fun Consultant :: Adrian Fisher
